overview: Eflatun, a blind woman since childhood, has been able to get a hold of her life with the help  of her father’s various shadow and sound plays. Eflatun inherits her father’s profession of  clock repair. She waits for a man with who she had fallen in love with his voice. One day a  man whose voice is identical to the man she’s searching for comes into the shop.
title: Eflâtun
